document.full_text: at&t has unveiled two smartphones: samsung infuse 4g, with a 4.5-inch touch-screen, and hp veer 4g, with a 2.6-inch multitouch display.
document.title: at&t has 2 new phones
lines_and_colors: at&t has unveiled two smartphones: samsung infuse 4g, with a 4.5-inch touch-screen, and hp veer 4g, with a 2.6-inch multitouch display.
